title: The New Italian
creator_credit: Joseph Krumgold, Michael Alexander, National Educational Television, Westinghouse Broadcasting and Intertel
brief_description: Using the small village of Gerrandina in the south as an example, this is a survey of the Italian government’s attempt to deal with Italy’s surplus population. Formerly this problem had been solved by immigration, but now land reform and more industrialisation are bringing more work and better living conditions to the southern Italian peasant
